title: So it was my birthday yesterday :^D
body: So these are the presents i got from my friends, the ones highlighted in red. (A big ty to my friends and MS paint for making this image possible :^). )

replies.body:
You actually have friends who gift...

I've only got Musterpulse.

HBD

> ...: Has received their mystery gift
> Talon12: Happy birthday
> ...: [please insert message here}
> 10 min later
> Talon12: Hello?
> ...: ...
> {waste of my time}

Enough of my lazy friends, happy BD m8
{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} The only person who gifts me is myself. From my other account. #friendless4ever

That's pretty good for mystery gifts,

Happy birthday for yesterday (or the day after that, time is weird)

-GL,HF
